Posts.Content: Feb 12, 2012 10:44AM lisamarie68 wrote: Hi, I just had an exicional done Feb 7th , I cant say it was fun . I then had to go back to ER next night due to post op infection . I am very sore and anxiuos about my results . my BS is not very nice and has caused me more anxiety , my follow up appt is this Wednesday and after that i already have a new BS lined up as ER doctor said noone will follow up someone elses work . I am so scared. I too have pappiloma but told nothing to worry about . now i read it may be cancer ... i went for microcalcs and birads 4a then after stereotactic and mri birads 6 .. i dont know what will happen now , but i know worry and wait is so hard ...i too cant eat and sleep .. best of luck on ur journeyÂ
